reviews.review: Gun makes portals. You use the gun to go through white (portable) walls, and exit each test. Tests get more difficult as you progress throughout the game. You gotta have BIG BRAIN to solve puzzles and then some. Cubes that can crush you. Platforms that stab you. Things that shoot you, burn you and/or your hair, cut you, shoot you even more, fall over you, make you run, make you jump, make walls portable, and emit deadly toxins, but above all else, kill you. 10/10 if you like co-oping with friends and throwing them off platforms. Portal 2, good game!
One of the best game series ever!
OYUN GÜZEL GRAFİKLERİ VE MEKANLARI HİKAYESİ GÜZEL VE ZEKA GEREKTİREN BİR OYUN TASARIMI GAYET İYİ ALINA BİLİR :)

Portal 2 est un jeu sympa, que je recommande pour ceux qui ont déjà apprécié le 1er.
Je ne dirais pas qu'il est super car j'ai trouvé qu'il était trop répétitif, même si on ajoute une intéressante histoire pour battre GlaDos.
Mais honnetement quand j'ai découvert que certaines salles étaient réutilisé du premier épisode, j'ai été un peu déçu.

Pour les vrais fans donc.
if you didnt play this game your'e missimg out

Нормальная покойная, угарная игра...
Только угарать
凄く楽しかった、時間を忘れてプレイしてしまった
unplayable if you're not playin with papkin obama

The game is amazing and an improvement over the original in every way, except I feel it lacks a little bit of the original's charm.  That said, this game is incredible, offers up a lot more story than the first and is full of vibrant and interesting characters and areas to explore.  The puzzles are once again top notch and the voice acting for Wheatley and Glados is incredible and funny, and when combined with the setting, offers a really immersive experience.
нету зомби лабаратори как в жта 5 нелзя стрелать из ак47
不仅单人游玩性非常好，而且还适合与朋友双人游戏
good for someone who like puzzle but not for player who don't like puzzle
интересная с хорошей графикой и управлением рекамендую
PLAY FOR HEALTH! THE GAME IS VERY BEAUTIFUL AND HUMOROS

在知道整个背景和世界观的情况下，结束时走出光圈科技的大门，只感觉到一阵悲凉

I wish there was more. But the story is solid and the pacing is perfect.
Definitely recommended. 10^6/10

Oyun çok güzel hikayesi de. Oynanışı da pek bir hoş. Glados orospusu bizim canımızı sıkıyor ve bazen bulmacalarda takılıyorsun beynin duruyor yarın girdiğimde ise bu muydu aq diyip devam etmek güzel bir hissiyat.
Brilliant game with some good humor
传送门2是我见过创意性与趣味性双佳的游戏，如果你刚刚想买一个便宜、剧情、游戏性都独具一格的游戏，快来入手这个游戏吧！
Отличная игра)!!! Развивает логическое мышление, реакцию, многое другое))).

A pesar de que no he jugado desde el 25 de julio de 2016, este juego me ha marcado por lo bien diseñado que está. Si te gustó el primero, este te encantará. Tiene todo lo que tiene el título anterior, pero mejor. Especial mención a la campaña cooperativa para dos jugadores, muy divertida para jugar con un amigo.
Everything a sequel should be: more of what made the first game so great. The coop mode is a must play if you have a good friend at hand.
Dsa spiel ist ein guter zeit vertreib

watching jacksepticeye play this and am going along with his progress

10/10
will play again

Simplemente su campaña es alucinante tanto con sus personajes y su propia trama. La verdad me parece un gran juego ya nunca antes se había visto estos tipos de puzles. El cooperativo es también muy bueno y divertido. 100% recomendable.

Es ist immer noch ein sehr geiles Game, statement. Es macht immer noch spaß und kann es einfach nur weiter empfehlen. Valve, macht bitte endlich Portal 3 ich kann einfach nicht mehr ohne ein neuen Teil Portal.
A really fun and enjoyable experience

Valve i know the number that should not be said scare you but please do a new portal you can call it 4 no one will blame you.

The Portal series is in a league of its own. This is my all time favorite game.
génial des barres de rire surtout en coop

the hilarious characters in the game make it more than just a puzzle but also a good story.

В этой части в отличие от первой, сделан классный кооперативный режим который, я настоятельно рекомендую только после прохождения основного сюжета. Кстати о нём, очень много свободного передвижение, что даёт ощутимое вовлечение. Игра объясняет многое несказанное в первой части. 10 из 10
What can I say? It's Portal 2. 10/10
Game is hilarious, smart, and you should own it if you have a few dollars to rub together.
頭使わないとクリアできないのが面白い。低スペックPCでも全然カクカクしない。素晴らしい
this game is definitely in my top 5 games of all time, and i've played around 700 games so thats saying something

This is like the third game I play here on Steam
I still have little experience on controlers and being fast with them, so here goes my review:

Some of you will say that this is ''a really short game'' OMFG IT FELT LIKE IT'S BEEN AGES TO GET TO THE END. But it's nothing I was expecting it to be and that was what it was exciting to me. It got me hanging on the edge of my seat through every chapter. So I would 100% recommend this game to everybody who is getting into gaming and wants something exciting. I f***ing loved this game.
Muy buen juego para estimular el cerebro, a mis 82 de años de edad es muy importante mantener activa la mente y que mejor utilizando la nueva tecnología que nos brinda el señor  :)

great story

I LOVE THIS GAME
